title: Interpretation of seeing diarrhea in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing diarrhea in a dream through an electronic site. See the site roy2a.com. Diarrhea is a disease that people suffer from and causes watery bowel movements. It is especially prevalent among infants and is mainly the most important reason when drinking water is unhealthy and mixed with sewage. When seeing diarrhea in a dream, this raises the viewer’s doubt about whether his vision is good or bad. Therefore, we will explain everything that the great scholars of interpretation have done in this matter, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing diarrhea in a dream Seeing diarrhea in a dream and it was white indicates that the dreamer will get rid of problems and sadness from his life. Seeing diarrhea means confusion in a dream The dreamer commits many mistakes and sins that distance him from God Almighty and he must repent. Whoever sees that he has diarrhea in the sea or river, it is a sign that the dreamer will be exposed to the loss of close people or the loss of money. Seeing clear diarrhea in a dream indicates that this will bring you money, treasure, and the fortune teller will be blessed in general. As for seeing worms in diarrhea in a dream? It indicates the dreamer’s distance from his family and friends and the state of isolation he lives in. Seeing an animal with diarrhea in a dream is a metaphor for the abundance of offspring. See also: Interpretation of seeing a specific person in a dream Interpretation of seeing diarrhea in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that he sees diarrhea inside The dream of eating it suggests that the dreamer is eating money that is not his right or suggesting magic. Smelling a bad smell from Diarrhea in a dream is an indication of the priest's bad reputation among people. Seeing green diarrhea in a dream is an indication of the disappearance of poverty and the replacement of what almost comforts the viewer. Seeing vomiting in a dream means diarrhea for many quarrels and the spread of obscenity. Seeing diarrhea in large quantities in a dream indicates the fortune teller's illness. Seeing diarrhea in a dream is a sign that the dreamer spends money foolishly and without thinking. What about seeing yourself sitting with diarrhea in a dream? It is an indication that the dreamer gets a lot of money and livelihood coming without effort, such as inheritance. See also: Interpretation of a dream about teaching ablution in a dream Interpretation of seeing diarrhea in a dream for a single woman Seeing diarrhea in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of abundant sustenance and provisions in her next life. Seeing diarrhea indicates that an unmarried woman will hear good news soon. Diarrhea can be for individuals It is also an indication that he married a failure for her and she should think carefully before agreeing. Interpretation of seeing diarrhea in a dream for a married woman Seeing blood in diarrhea in a married woman's dream is an indication of problems at home, but they will pass. Seeing diarrhea in a married woman indicates that the woman has diarrhea in The dream of her ability to get out of her crises and overcome difficulties. Seeing green diarrhea in a dream indicates that she is a married woman at the end of worry and sadness in her life and almost relieved her. See also: Interpretation of seeing trees falling in a dream Interpretation of seeing diarrhea in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing diarrhea in a pregnant woman’s dream is a metaphor for a state of fatigue

title: Interpretation of seeing grilled meat in a dream for senior imams

preview.html: A person's vision of grilled meat in his dream is one of the dreams that occurs repeatedly, and this vision has many interpretations and many connotations. We will learn this through the site: Different interpretation of seeing grilled meat in a dream. Interpretation of seeing grilled meat in a dream. Commentators differed in the interpretation of seeing grilled meat in a dream. Some see this vision as a sign of earning some money or status, and others believe that this vision symbolizes falling into something that the dreamer hates. Interpretations vary according to the type of grilled meat, as well as the method of preparing it. Interpretation of seeing grilled meat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explains in his interpretation of seeing grilled meat in a dream that this vision is one of the visions worthy of praise, as it indicates the abundance of food and the goodness of the dreamer. Ibn Sirin says: If a person sees himself grilling meat, this indicates his effort and effort in solving his caliphate and its problems, and his desire to end his rulings and his success in doing so. If the dreamer is single and sees himself preparing meat for grilling, then this symbolizes the approaching date of his wedding, God willing. Also, seeing grilled meat indicates Ease of eating without stress, as it indicates the high status of the fortuneteller. It can be considered a sign of marriage or that the dreamer will have a child. Interpretation of seeing grilled meat in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that whoever sees in his dream that he is eating grilled meat, and that this meat was pork, then he will elaborate on that. The dreamer obtains illegal money, and this money is forbidden. The vision also shows that the dreamer will get into a lot of trouble and unpleasant things will happen to him. But if the grilled meat is snake meat, then this is a good vision and good news for the sleeper that he will be saved from some who wish him harm and stay away from them. Read also: Interpretation of seeing hot peppers in a dream for women Unmarried women: Interpretation of seeing grilled meat in a dream for a man. Seeing the sleeper in his dream that he is eating grilled meat, and the taste of the meat is delicious and tasty, means that he will have a good and ample diet. And you see a man grilling meat and adding some salt to it, this is evidence that he is earning money that is not permissible and a warning to him to stay away. What is forbidden. Seeing roasting a pig and eating it indicates that the dreamer is obtaining money that is not his right. If a person sees in a dream that he is eating a large amount of grilled meat, this is interpreted as his desire to get what he wants. And if the dreamer sees in his vision that he is preparing meat for grilling, It is good that he will get a lot of food. If the dreamer is single and sees grilled meat in his dream, this is good news that he will marry a beautiful girl with good character. The interpretation of some visions varies depending on the type of grilled meat in the dream. If it is goat meat, then this is due to the viewer experiencing serious health problems. If it is beef, this indicates a change in the fortuneteller's condition for the better. If the roasted meat is horse meat, this is an indication that the dreamer is a man of high status in his life. Like red grilled meat, this symbolizes the dreamer’s wisdom and patience in making his decisions. And when a man sees that he is making

title: Interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Blue is one of the cold colors that indicates calm, peace, and tenderness. It is the color of the sea and shows comfort, internal stability, and love. For his nature and contemplation. Seeing the color blue in a dream is one of the dreams that may appear to anyone. The mind is strongly attracted to it because colors are among the details that attract the mind. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing the color blue in a dream, according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the color blue in a dream, interpretation of Ibn Sirin. If she sees that she is wearing a beautiful blue dress, coordinated with a wonderful appearance, then if this indicates something, then it is a sound and good vision that indicates For the comfort, peace, and state of calm and security that can happen to her. It also indicates that she has a path to a life full of energy and activity and will meet happiness in her life. And if the color of the dream is blue in the sky. God, there was so much money to be had, and her thoughts had been occupied lately with how to get it. It contributes to a successful business operation. Sometimes, she says, if the events are really related to her traveling somewhere, it is good for her and she will do it with ease and ease, to find luck and money in this trip. It is a great good, because all things divine are blue . Like the sky and the sea, it indicates that she will succeed in her studies and excel if she is a student, but in the case of practical life she will witness a significant change in successes. It is evidence of her high position in society, the abundance of her strength, and her success in life by choosing her life partner. The dreamer will be blessed with blessings in the near future, and God Almighty is high. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the color blue in a dream for a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation: It basically indicates food, righteousness, blessings in life, and God’s satisfaction. If a lady with a vision sees that she is wearing a blue jacket or dress, then this success is that she will wear it and conquer it. It is rare for this color to be a sign of something bad or bad in the dream, whether for her or for others. Seeing her husband wearing a piece of cloth of this color or leaning towards the sky, it is most likely that this is success and a promotion in his work that may come to him in the near future, and that he will achieve some success that will impress her administrators. . It is the ability to earn a living that can be given. It also indicates the close relationship between husband and wife and the increase in love and affection between them. If she sees that she is placing pieces of cloth in her home as furniture, it is good that a state of calm and comfort will also settle in her home. And away from Satan's whispers and temptations. If someone sees her clothes in this color, this is a positive step she will take in her life, such as working in a prestigious job and succeeding in it. Or she will give birth to a good boy. Whether the color in the dream tends to be light or dark, it is a good dream that indicates a symbol of prosperity and success, and a state of psychological peace and marital life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the color blue in a dream for a man. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin, if it comes

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wall clock

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a wall clock for unmarried women: If an unmarried girl dreams of a wall clock in her dream, this may indicate a lot of good news that will change her life for the better. Seeing a wall clock in an unmarried woman’s dream may indicate her marriage to a good person who has a good personality and a tender heart. Also, seeing an unmarried woman hanging on a wall in a dream may indicate her academic success if she is a student and achieves the highest grades. Interpretation of dreaming about a wall clock in a dream could be a sign that a girl will soon get engaged to a young man who has a lot of money and people will be very happy with her. This vision can also indicate abundant sustenance, prosperity, and the fulfillment of desires that have become out of reach. But if a single girl dreams of a fixed wall clock, this may mean that she is waiting to hear news about a specific matter that interests her. Interpretation of seeing a wall clock for a married woman: A married woman’s dream of a clock indicates A wall clock in a dream indicates her intense love and attachment to her husband and wishes him a long life. Seeing a wall clock hanging in the house may mean that happy news will be heard soon and happiness will enter the heart of the visionary. If a married woman wants to have children and dreams of a wall clock in a dream, this may indicate That she will soon have children and that her situation with her husband will be good. Interpretation of a dream about buying a wall clock for a married woman. It indicates that she has obtained a large livelihood, perhaps from her husband’s work, and perhaps it indicates her high status among people. If a married woman dreams that she is looking at a wall clock With a smile, this may be evidence of her closeness to God through good deeds. You may be interested in: Interpretation of dreams about a black wristwatchInterpretation of a dream about a wall clock for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in her dream a wall clock hanging in her house, this may mean that her due date is near and it will be Easy and easy, God willing. A pregnant woman sees a wall clock during her sleep. This may indicate her urgent need to see her child, complete her birth well, and her desire to get rid of the problems of pregnancy. Seeing a wall clock for a pregnant woman may indicate the intensity of her love for her husband, the good relations between them, and the feeling With safety in his arms. If a pregnant woman dreams that she buys a wall clock and hangs it. This may indicate the birth of a boy and she will become pregnant again after him, so they will have good offspring, God willing. If the wall clock is made of gold, it may indicate that her husband has gained a great livelihood or that he He held a high position in his work. Interpretation of seeing a wall clock for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman dreams of a wall clock hanging in the house. This may indicate that she will soon marry another man of good reputation, good morals and religion. Interpretation of a dream about a wall clock in a dream about a divorced woman. It may indicate a lot Of sustenance and money that she will have soon, and it will be halal food, blessed. If a divorced woman sees that she is buying a wall clock. It may indicate that she will regain her rights from her ex-husband. If a divorced woman dreams that a wall clock is not working, this may indicate that she is in trouble.

title: Symbols that indicate the sex of the fetus in a dream are signs of pregnancy, a boy or a girl

preview.html: Signs that indicate that a pregnant woman is pregnant with a boy or a girl, or pregnant with a male child, or indicates a pregnancy with twins, and dreams of a pregnant woman that determine the sex of the fetus according to Ibn Sirin. Symbols that indicate pregnancy, a boy or a girl. If a pregnant woman dreams that she has given birth to a girl, then she will give birth to a boy, and seeing a woman carrying a chain Goldfish foretells pregnancy with a boy. Seeing the arrival of a visitor in a dream portends memory. Seeing the husband’s face black or black in a dream symbolizes the pregnancy of a girl, in reference to the Almighty’s saying: “And if someone preaches to a woman, his face will remain black.” The rooster, the falcon, the eagle, and all male birds symbolize Pregnancy with a boy. Seeing a woman in a dream, as if she were a reflection of a child, a young boy, is good for memory. Seeing a pregnant woman in her dream as if she is menstruating symbolizes a male child. If a husband sees in his dream as if a tooth had fallen into his lap, this is good for the boy. Seeing a pregnant woman or her husband seeing his wife while she is Holding the Torah in her hands indicates pregnancy with a woman. Seeing a pregnant woman dreaming of a sacrifice symbolizes the birth of a male child who will be just and good for his family, and this relates to the story of our master Ishmael and Abraham, peace be upon them. Seeing a pregnant woman as if she were standing at a well and drinking from it, to find clean and good water suitable for the male child. Seeing a marital bed in a man’s dream is good for memory. Seeing a crown on a pregnant woman’s head in a dream is a sign of giving birth to a son. Eating grilled camel meat and sheep is good for a boy. Seeing the moon as if the husband’s image is reflected in it portends a boy. Seeing a pen also indicates memory. Seeing the gift of a chair and sitting on it is a sign. On carrying a boy. Seeing our Master Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a married man’s dream or in a pregnant woman’s dream is good news of the pregnancy of a boy. Seeing a pregnant woman like her image in a woman in the form of a beautiful young girl heralds femininity. Seeing a knife in a man’s dream is a sign of the presence of a boy and seeing a head. Gray hair symbolizes a man. Seeing a pregnant husband or wife with a dirham, which is a currency, portends a good boy. Seeing a husband in his dream as if he was eating a cucumber means that his wife will give birth to a daughter, chicken, duck, etc. Of the female birds, it symbolizes the birth of a girl. Seeing fasting on the day of Ashura symbolizes a good boy. Seeing a bucket, a bucket, is a sign of a male child. Seeing a married man as if a fish came out of his side and his wife being pregnant, foretells a female. Seeing a pregnant woman as if she gave birth to a boy means that she is pregnant with a girl. Seeing silver is good news for the girl. Seeing a gold ring and seeing pregnancy portends a male child. Symbols that indicate the gender of the baby in a pregnant woman’s dreams - YouTube

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a white camel in a dream, Ibn Sirin’s white camel?

preview.html: There is a lot of research on the interpretation of seeing a white camel in a dream. These visions symbolize associations that vary depending on their details and the condition of the person seeing them. In fact, some of them bring good skin to their owner, and some of them warn him of something bad, and similar to this article in the encyclopedia we explain in detail the interpretation of a dream about white camels. Interpretation of seeing a white camel in a dream Dream interpretation scholars say that dreaming about a white camel symbolizes that the dreamer has a good heart and pure intentions. Whoever sees a white camel in his dream. His vision showed that he has relieved his pain and relief will come to his life and will make it easier soon. This vision also indicates that the dreamer is following legitimate ways to earn a living. When one sees a white camel in a dream and tries to travel in reality. The vision foretells that he will achieve what he wants and change his situation for the better. The symbol of the camel in a dream: The camel in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s movement from one place to another or from one social position and from one economic level to another. It also symbolizes that the fortuneteller will triumph over his enemies, achieve what he wants, and obtain Abundance of livelihood and lawful money. Falling from the back of a camel in a dream indicates that the dreamer will lose his money and be exposed to a financial crisis. To dream that you own a camel is one of the dreams promising victory over enemies and eliminating them. When someone sees in his dream that he is pulling a camel. This means that he will face difficulties in his marriage. A small camel in a dream indicates that the dreamer will have a simple lifestyle that meets his own needs. Whoever sees in his dream that he is chasing a small camel. His vision showed that money will increase in the coming period. If the dreamer is still studying; His vision shows that he will succeed in his studies. An ominous dream is to see a baby camel screaming. It indicates that the fortuneteller is exposed to a great deal of trouble. Milking a camel in a dream indicates foolishness that the dreamer commits in reality. He needs to review himself and his actions. Whoever sees in his dream that he drank camel’s milk. His vision showed his victory over his enemy, an increase in his money, and a change in his circumstances for the better. If the dreamer is suffering from an illness, then his vision of him foretells an imminent recovery. If he dreams that he is riding a camel without knowing his destination, this is a sign of the emergence of many problems in his life. Seeing a camel bite is one of the dreams in which the dreamer commits wrong actions that he cannot get rid of. This vision also shows the dreamer’s poor condition, but if the dreamer is really sick, then his dream about a camel bite indicates that he will recover soon. The white camel in a single woman’s dream. The single girl’s vision of the white camel in Her dream is auspicious dreams about her marriage to a good and pious man who will treat her as God wants. Also, a white camel in an unmarried girl’s dream shows good qualities such as her patience and generosity with others. Who dreams of a white camel. Her vision showed that God will grant her what she desires and give her luck and success in her life. An unmarried girl’s dream of receiving camels as a gift from a man she does not know indicates that her marriage is imminent and that she will receive a large dowry. If she is unmarried, she dreams of taming a camel. This indicates her marriage to a weak man. It is a good vision

title: Learn about the interpretation of the appearance of engagement in a dream for a single woman from Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the appearance of engagement in a dream for an unmarried woman. Interpretation of seeing engagement in a dream for a single woman. Engagement is the covenant that each party tries to fulfill a part of until it is completed and both parties reach the stage of marriage. Seeing engagement is considered one of the favorite visions that includes many associations that vary according to considerations. a lot. The suitor may be an unknown or well-known person and could be a lover or a specific person, and what concerns us in this article is to mention all the clues and details to know the engagement in a single woman’s dream. Getting engaged in a dream for a single woman. Seeing engagement in one dream expresses many changes that she will receive in The coming period, which requires a quick response and acceptance of these changes to adapt to them quickly. If a girl sees her engagement in a dream, this symbolizes that she will receive important news in the coming days, and this news will be based on the final decision and priority. This vision indicates diligent pursuit, hard work, and walking cleanly without turning around. Or deviating from the path. The engagement vision is also a reflection of the presence of an engagement in reality or the preparation for a happy event, which may be the wedding of one of the dreamer’s relatives or the preparation for her own wedding. The engagement vision also indicates the goals that the girl seeks to achieve gradually, as she moves from her sub-goals To finally reach the main and desired goal. On the other hand, commitment in a dream could be an indication of the academic or practical aspect, professional associations or the presence of agreements related to certain matters such as travel, moving to a new place, changing some outdated ideas and beliefs and openness. On others. This vision is an indication of a world in which a girl receives more attention and care, and to the many ambitions and desires that she would like to achieve no matter how long she lives. Engagement in a dream of an unmarried woman by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin believes that seeing her engagement in a dream of an unmarried woman is an indication of her marriage In the coming days, this vision is very promising for her with many pleasant surprises and happy occasions. If she sees that she is engaged in a dream, this indicates harmony and agreement, unification of visions and goals, resolution of previous disagreements, and consensus on a point of view. Seeing herself engaged in her dream shows the bond that makes her She loses some things and powers that she had in the past, gives up things and gains other things. The engagement can be a sign of an urgent matter or important news that the girl was looking forward to. If the engagement is as planned by the unmarried woman, then this symbolizes happiness and the fulfillment of a long-held desire Extending her, achieving a great goal and overcoming many obstacles that were worrying her. And if she sees that she is engaged to an older man, this indicates that she has gained experiences that will help her manage her life. If the engagement is on a Friday, this means success, blessings, and the completion of all projects and postponed matters. Engagement in A dream for an unmarried woman according to Imam Al-Sadiq is considered

title: The 8 most famous interpretations of seeing the call to prayer in a dream

preview.html: The eight most popular interpretations of seeing hearing the call to prayer in a dream may indicate Hajj, Umrah, or inviting people, or a dream of the call to prayer may indicate gaining authority, power, and status. Seeing the call to prayer indicates the location of the call to prayer and the dreamer’s condition, as well as various dream indications, and this we will explain in this article. What is the interpretation of a person leading the prayer after the call? What proves that he will perform Hajj or Umrah. What is the purpose of seeing a child calling? It indicates the dreamer’s desire to His father was acquitted of a charge against them. What is the interpretation of seeing the sound of the call to prayer at home? Evidence of the death of a sister or son. Interpretation of seeing a young man’s ear in a hole in a dream? It is reported that he went to a far place to travel with his relatives. What is the interpretation of seeing a single woman in a dream calling for prayer in Pigeons? Evidence that she is a disreputable girl. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is calling to prayer and then begins the obligatory prayer with the pilgrims, this indicates the goodness and blessing that he will obtain. Seeing a person in a dream that he is leading the prayer after the call to prayer, then performs Hajj or Umrah. Then Seeing a person calling for prayer inside a well indicates that he is a person loved by the people. When a person sees in his dream that he is standing on a hill and begins to call the call to prayer, he will take a high position in his work. Whoever sees in a dream a child calling for prayer, this indicates the dreamer’s desire to be relieved. His father is one of the accusations against him. Whoever dreams that he hears the sound of the ear and does not want to hear his own voice, this is a sign that there are disreputable people around him. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer for Nablus: Seeing someone calling to prayer at the Kaaba is evidence of the spread of heresies and temptations among people. If one calls to Praying inside the interior of the Holy Kaaba in a dream, this is a sign of bad news and misfortune. Hearing the call to prayer at home is evidence of the death of a sister or son. Seeing the call to prayer on a neighbor’s roof indicates a lack of trust in these neighbors. If one sees that he is calling for prayer in an unclean place, This indicates that he is a paralyzed and disreputable person. Seeing the call to prayer in a single woman’s dream If an unmarried woman dreams that she is calling to prayer in the bathroom, this means that she is a girl with a bad reputation. Hearing the call to prayer in a single woman’s sleep is often something good that comes to her. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer for a woman Married woman: If he sees that he is making the call for fun, he will get sick or go crazy. If a married woman dreams that she is calling for prayer among those who did not hear her, then she will suffer from injustice. Interpretation of seeing the call for a man: If one sees that he is calling the call to prayer from the top of the minaret, then he will be blessed with Hajj. Then, If he sees that he is giving the call to prayer inside a well, he will help his friends travel with him for work. If a person dreams that he is working as a call to prayer, he will be lucky with a lot of money. Then seeing a man praying on a butterfly or in front of his house is evidence that his death is approaching. If a young man dreams that he is giving the call to prayer In the desert, this is evidence that he will work as a spy. After that, if a young man gives the call to prayer in a dream inside a hole, this indicates that he will travel to a distant place with his relatives.

title: Interpretation of seeing a mountain in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a mountain. The mountain was created by God, and it is the highest peak on earth, and seeing it in a dream indicates prestige, power, and the fulfillment of desires. We will deal with the interpretation of seeing a mountain in a dream in detail based on the opinion of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq, or contemporary interpreters, so follow us on the Vision website. Interpretation Dreaming of a mountain in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing a mountain in a dream indicates a very respectable person. Watching a fall from a mountain indicates committing sins and transgressions. Seeing you standing on the mountain indicates rising status and reaching the highest scientific ranks. Interpretation of seeing a mountain in a man’s dream who sees himself climbing the mountain until he settles on Its peak, which indicates his reaching the highest scientific ranks or his dominance and wide fame. Seeing a volcano rising from the mountain in a man’s dream indicates the problems and difficulties that the man faces. Seeing it coming down from the mountain in a man’s dream indicates the completion of an important part of one’s life and may indicate some failures. Or committing a sin. Interpretation of seeing a mountain in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is climbing a mountain with someone, it indicates the success and success of her journey and the achievement of a bright future. If a girl sees herself flying over a mountain, this indicates her reaching the highest academic ranks. If a girl sees that she is climbing A mountain and its green color indicates good planning for the future and achieving one’s goals after a short period of time. Interpretation of seeing a mountain in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is on the top of the mountain and sees natural scenery, this may indicate a wide social status and a reputation that many envy. A dream of throwing stones from The highest mountain in a married woman’s dream indicates bad words that hurt others, such as neighbors and friends. Seeing climbing Mount Arafat in a married woman’s dream indicates religiosity, good morals, and maintaining obedience. Interpretation of seeing a mountain in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing him climbing the mountain in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the date of birth. The future and the fulfillment of her desires. If a pregnant woman sees that she climbed a mountain and found food and drink and ate and drank, this indicates prosperity, well-being and happiness for the newborn. Interpretation of seeing a mountain in a dream for a divorced woman and a widow. If a divorced woman or a widow sees that she is on the mountain and the mountain trembles with her, this indicates serious problems and disagreements in her life that may She will be with her husband’s family. If a divorced or widow sees a lot of green color on the mountain, it indicates the abundance of goodness and blessings that she will receive in the next season of her life. Interpretation of a dream about a mountain and water. Seeing the demolition of a mountain in a dream announces victory over the enemies. If a young man sees that he climbed the mountain and found food And a drink, it may indicate marriage to a rich and beautiful woman. Interpretation of a dream about collapsing mountains. Seeing a mountain collapsing in a dream indicates the death of a king or president. Watching a mountain collapse indicates the occurrence of family problems and disputes. Interpretation of dreams about an easy descent from a mountain. Seeing the entrance to a cave inside a mountain. This indicates the strength of faith and sound faith. Avoid disobedience and sins. Seeing the mountain

If a young man sees that he climbed the mountain and found food And a drink, it may indicate marriage to a rich and beautiful woman. Interpretation of a dream about collapsing mountains. Seeing a mountain collapsing in a dream indicates the death of a king or president. Watching a mountain collapse indicates the occurrence of family problems and disputes. Interpretation of dreams about an easy descent from a mountain. Seeing the entrance to a cave inside a mountain. This indicates the strength of faith and sound faith. Avoid disobedience and sins.
